title: Option to change location of wsl
body: By default wsl is installing to the system drive. In much cases this is an SSD with less space than a second drive like a normal hdd with much more space. If you use wsl for development of a Website or try to use WSL with an x-server for windows much space is needed to take advantage of it. So there should be an option to move the wsl and all files containing to a drive where an user has much more space than on it's system drive by default.
